comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Nobel Prize in Chemistry, 1914 (and, sadly, no relation, despite our same last names and states of birth): www.nobelprize.org/nobel_prizes/chemistry/laureates/1914/... en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theodore_William_Richards He married one of his professors' daughters; in turn, his daughter married a chemistry professor too--James Bryant Conant became president of Harvard. So this is Richards' son-in-law: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Bryant_Conant And this is one of his grandsons, Ted Conant: library.columbia.edu/indiv/eastasian/korean/rarespecial/c...
